sentences.en: A racing injury forced Stephen Roche to pull out.
sentences.cn: 一次比赛中的受伤使斯蒂芬·罗奇不得不退出。

sentences.en: A small crowd attempted to pull down a statue.
sentences.cn: 一小伙人试图推倒一尊塑像。

sentences.en: a tractor pulling a trailer
sentences.cn: 后挂一辆拖车的拖拉机

sentences.en: After the crash, many Wall Street investors pulled out.
sentences.cn: 股市暴跌之后，华尔街的许多投资者都退缩了

sentences.en: Everyone was very concerned whether he would pull through or not.
sentences.cn: 每个人都很关心他是否能够挺过去。

sentences.en: He gave her a sharp pull forward.
sentences.cn: 他猛地把她往前一拉。

sentences.en: He took a deep pull of his cigarette and exhaled the smoke.
sentences.cn: 他深吸了一口烟，然后轻轻吐了出来。

sentences.en: He waited several minutes for a car to pull up alongside.
sentences.cn: 他等了几分钟，直到一辆汽车靠边停下。

sentences.en: I managed to pull myself up onto a wet, sloping ledge.
sentences.cn: 我终于爬上了一块潮湿倾斜的暗礁。

sentences.en: I need to have the top people in this company pull together.
sentences.cn: 我需要将公司的最高层团结起来。

sentences.en: I only pull in 15,000 a year as a social worker.
sentences.cn: 作为一名社工，我每年仅挣15,000。

sentences.en: it had been like pulling teeth to extract these two small items from Moore.
sentences.cn: 从穆尔那里弄到这两条小消息真是太难了。

sentences.en: it had been like pulling teeth to extract these two small items from Moore.
sentences.cn: 从穆尔那里弄到这两条小消息真是太难了。

sentences.en: it had been like pulling teeth to extract these two small items from Moore.
sentences.cn: 从穆尔那里弄到这两条小消息真是太难了。

sentences.en: it had been like pulling teeth to extract these two small items from Moore.
sentences.cn: 从穆尔那里弄到这两条小消息真是太难了。

sentences.en: Let me now pull together the threads of my argument.
sentences.cn: 现在让我来将我的论点串起来。

sentences.en: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.cn: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

sentences.en: pull down an old office building.
sentences.cn: 摧毁一幢旧办公大楼

sentences.en: pulled off a last-minute victory.
sentences.cn: 获取了最后一分钟的胜利

sentences.en: pulls down a hefty salary.
sentences.cn: 拿到一大笔薪水

sentences.en: Scientists are trying to pull together disparate ideas in astronomy.
sentences.cn: 科学家们正试图将天文学中的各派观点整合在一起。

sentences.en: The banks have the power to pull the plug on the project.
sentences.cn: 银行有能力让该工程终止。

sentences.en: The feather must be removed with a straight, firm pull.
sentences.cn: 拔羽毛必须干净利落。

sentences.en: the gravitational pull of the moon
sentences.cn: 月球的引力

sentences.en: The horse pulled away and took the lead in the race.
sentences.cn: 这匹马向前冲并在比赛中取得领先

sentences.en: The limousine pulled away from the curb.
sentences.cn: 轿车驶离了路边

sentences.en: The militia in Lebanon has agreed to pull out of Beirut.
sentences.cn: 黎巴嫩的民兵组织已经同意从贝鲁特撤出。

sentences.en: The organisers have to employ performers to pull a crowd.
sentences.cn: 组织者不得不雇些演员来聚拢人气。

sentences.en: The pull-out of the army paves the way for independence.
sentences.cn: 军队的撤出为独立铺平了道路。

sentences.en: The state trooper pulled the speeding motorist over.
sentences.cn: 州警命令超速的摩托车手把车停到路边

sentences.en: The train pulls out at noon.
sentences.cn: 火车在中午发车

sentences.en: We pulled in at midnight.
sentences.cn: 我们午夜抵达

sentences.en: We pulled over to watch the sunset.
sentences.cn: 我们停下车看日落

words.tran_cn: 拉的人，拉具；吸引人的东西，招揽顾客的东西
拉，拉绳；拉力，[交]牵引力；拖

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［表达事情极为难办时的用语］太难了
撤退：尤指部队执行有秩序的撤退
【非正式用语】 获得：抽出（钱）作为报酬
艰苦地完成：尽管有困难和障碍依然进行；完成，成功
退缩：从某种境况或承诺中撤出
命令停在路边：指示或迫使（摩托车）停在路边
使恢复，恢复健康：恢复或被恢复到良好的健康状况
成功地突破困苦：成功地通过或克服麻烦或疾病
超前：在比赛中移动到领先的位置或地方

trans.tran_cn: 扯，力，吸引力，影响，深吸，艰难攀登，拉伤，拉手，拉球
trans.tran_en: an act of using force to move something towards you or in the same direction that you are moving
to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving

trans.tran_cn: 拉，抽出，脱下，挣脱，拔出，拖动，收拢，扭伤，转向，吃力运转，划，耍（花招），犯下罪行，吸引，撤销，停车，拉球侧斜
trans.tran_en: to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving
to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving
